message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $130 for it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget
I appreciate your willingness to pay more, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $135, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny. Let me know if that works for you.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $135. How about we meet at $110? I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get it for a bit cheaper

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $135, so I'm offering it to you for $122.50. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. How about we meet at $115? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get it for a bit cheaper

I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $115, but I'd like to get a bit more out of the deal. I'm going to offer it to you for $125. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
